title: Flipped Learning-Based Intensive Java Algorithm Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding fundamental programming concepts and basic Java syntax
context.additional_context: Project-Based Assessment Process in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technology Settings: Designed to Simultaneously Strengthen Learners' Algorithm Design and Java Implementation Skills

learning_goals: Learners can implement various types of algorithms (sorting, searching, recursion) using the Java language
Learners can analyze given problems, select optimal algorithms, and create design blueprints
Learners can complete Java-based algorithm projects that solve real-world problems through team collaboration

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
